member.name: MFVideoCompressedInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a video compression format. This structure is used in the structure.

member.name: MFVideoCompressedInfo.AvgBitrate
member.summary: Average bit rate of the encoded video stream, in bits per second.

member.name: MFVideoCompressedInfo.AvgBitErrorRate
member.summary: Expected error rate, in bits per second.

member.name: MFVideoCompressedInfo.MaxKeyFrameSpacing
member.summary: Number of frames between key frames.
